subject: Product Not Working - Need Immediate Help
body:
Dear Support Team,

I purchased your software last week and have been experiencing constant crashes. The application freezes every time I try to save my work. I've already tried reinstalling twice but the issue persists.

This is affecting my productivity and I need a solution as soon as possible.

Best regards,
John Smith
label: Customer Support / Complaints

subject: Urgent: System Error Code 404
body:
Hello Support,

I'm getting error code 404 when trying to access the dashboard. This started happening after the latest update. I've cleared my cache and cookies but the problem remains.

Please advise on how to resolve this issue.

Thanks,
Sarah Johnson
label: Customer Support / Complaints

subject: Billing Dispute - Incorrect Charges
body:
Dear Customer Service,

I noticed an unexpected charge of $299 on my last statement. This doesn't match my subscription plan. I've attached my receipt and billing statement for your review.

Please investigate and correct this error.

Regards,
Michael Brown
label: Customer Support / Complaints

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body:
Hi Support Team,

I've been using your app for months and would love to see a dark mode option. Many of us work late hours and this would be a great addition.

Could you let me know if this is in your roadmap?

Best,
Emily Chen
label: Customer Support / Complaints

subject: Software Installation Issues
body:
Dear Support,

I'm unable to complete the installation process. The setup wizard keeps failing at 75%. I'm running Windows 11 with all updates installed.

Please provide troubleshooting steps.

Thanks,
David Wilson
label: Customer Support / Complaints

subject: Pricing Inquiry for Enterprise Plan
body:
Hello Sales Team,

I'm interested in your enterprise solution for our company of 200 employees. Could you please provide pricing details and any volume discounts available?

Also, what's included in the enterprise support package?

Best regards,
Robert Anderson
label: Sales Inquiry / Pricing Request

subject: Quote Request: Annual Subscription
body:
Hi there,

I'd like to get a quote for an annual subscription to your premium service. We're a small business with 15 users.

Please include any early-bird discounts if available.

Thanks,
Lisa Martinez
label: Sales Inquiry / Pricing Request

subject: Bulk License Pricing
body:
Dear Sales Department,

We're considering purchasing 50 licenses for your software. Could you provide pricing information for bulk purchases?

Also, what are the payment terms and available support options?

Regards,
James Thompson
label: Sales Inquiry / Pricing Request

subject: Custom Solution Pricing
body:
Hello,

I'm interested in your platform but need some custom features. Could you provide pricing for a tailored solution?

We need integration with our existing CRM and custom reporting capabilities.

Best,
Patricia Lee
label: Sales Inquiry / Pricing Request

subject: Educational License Inquiry
body:
Hi Sales Team,

I'm from a university and interested in your educational licensing program. We need licenses for our computer science department.

Please provide pricing and any special terms for educational institutions.

Regards,
Dr. William Clark
label: Sales Inquiry / Pricing Request

subject: Partnership Opportunity: Integration
body:
Dear Business Development Team,

I'm reaching out from TechCorp to discuss a potential integration partnership. Our platform has 100,000+ active users who could benefit from your services.

Would you be interested in exploring a strategic partnership?

Best regards,
Jennifer White
label: Partnership / Collaboration Proposal

subject: Joint Marketing Initiative
body:
Hello,

I'm the Marketing Director at Innovate Solutions. We're interested in co-hosting a webinar series with your company.

Our audience aligns perfectly with your target market. Let's discuss potential collaboration.

Regards,
Thomas Garcia
label: Partnership / Collaboration Proposal

subject: API Integration Partnership
body:
Hi there,

I'm from DataFlow Systems. We're looking to integrate your API into our platform. This could benefit both our user bases.

Would you be open to discussing a technical partnership?

Best,
Rachel Kim
label: Partnership / Collaboration Proposal

subject: Research Collaboration
body:
Dear Team,

I'm a professor at Stanford University. Our AI research lab is interested in collaborating on a joint research project.

Your technology could be valuable for our work. Let's discuss possibilities.

Regards,
Dr. Maria Rodriguez
label: Partnership / Collaboration Proposal

subject: Strategic Alliance Proposal
body:
Hello Business Development,

I'm from Global Solutions Inc. We're expanding into your market and see potential for a strategic alliance.

Would you be interested in exploring a joint venture?

Best regards,
Daniel Park
label: Partnership / Collaboration Proposal
